price: Hawajui ya kwamba Mwenyezi Mungu anayajua wanayo yaficha na wanayo yatangaza?
arabic: أَوَلَا يَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ
footnotes: Hivyo basi haiwapitikii watu hawa na wale kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu hana haja ya kupata hoja kama hizo? Kwani Yeye anajua wanacho kificha na wanacho kidhihirisha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: awalā yaʿlamūna anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
